匬字的基本解释

匬
yǔ
〔瓯（
中国殷代地名。島 ）匬〕中国古代一种容器，可容十六斗。亦作“瓯臾”；亦简作“匬”。

匬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǔ］
［《集韻》勇主切，上麌，以。］
(1)古代的一种容器，容量为十六斗。
(2)殷时地名用字。

匬字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【匚字部】　匬； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页154第07
【集韻】勇主切，音庾。同斞。【說文】量也。【玉篇】器受十六斗。又【集韻】徒侯切，音頭。【說文】甌器也。

匬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
匬字的起名意思

暂无。

匬
Basic explanation of words
匬
yǔ
〔Ou (
Place names in Yin Dynasty in China. Island) 匬〕An ancient Chinese container that can hold sixteen buckets. Also known as "Ouyu"; also simply known as "匬".
匬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [yǔ]
["Jiyun" courageously cut, go up, to. ]
(1) An ancient container with a capacity of sixteen buckets.
(2) The place names are used in time.
匬
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [匚字部] 倀匬; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 154 07
【Jiyun】The heroic master cuts, the sound is Yu. Same thing. [Said the text] The amount is also. [Jade articles] The instrument is subject to sixteen fights. Also 【Jiyun】Tu Houqie, sound head. 【Said Wen】Ouqi also.
匬
